name: French Onion Soup
description: Onions simmered with garlic, brown sugar and finished with a sherry beef stock, house bread crouton, Provolone & Swiss cheeses

name: Chipotle Beef Chili with Colby Jack (*GF *
description: indicates gluten free )

name: Soup du Jour
description: Chef’s homemade soup of the day

name: Fried Mozzarella Cheese
description: Homemade cheese sticks deep-fried, served with either raspberry or marinara sauce.

name: Beef Bruschetta ~
description: AVAILABLE WHILE THEY LAST ~ Tender, hand trimmed Filet Mignon tips broiled with roasted peppers and balsamic vinaigrette. Topped with shredded Parmesan and served over grilled garlic toast.

name: Buffalo Chicken Wings
description: Choose your Style!!! Regular, Hot, Cajun, BBQ or Garlic Pepper Parmesan Our deep fried, crispy, fresh Chicken Wings are tossed in a tangy wing sauce, broiler finished and served with blue cheese and celery-carrot sticks.

name: Smoked Gouda Short Rib Poutine ~
description: IDEAL FOR SHARING ~ Our award winning, boneless Short Ribs seared & braised with red wine, Worcestershire and brown sugar. Simmered with a rich demi-glace, nestled over seasoned steak fries & garnished with smoked gouda cheese & chopped green onions.

name: Shrimp Cocktail (*GF
description: without oyster crackers ) A quintet of jumbo Shrimp served with a classic cocktail dipping sauce, crackers and lemon.

name: Fried Mushrooms ~
description: AVAILABLE WHILE THEY LAST ~ Button mushrooms are batter dipped in Italian-seasoned bread crumbs, deep-fried golden brown, & served with creamy garlic ranch dipping sauce.

name: Garden Salad
description: Mesclun field greens, grape tomatoes, cucumbers and garlic croutons with your choice of dressing: Honey ginger, buttermilk ranch, blue cheese, balsamic, Russian

name: Hot Spinach Salad (*GF)
description: Spinach greens, grated Swiss, hard boiled egg, cucumber and tomato. Served with a warm balsamic, bacon, mushroom vinaigrette on the side. Add a grilled Chicken Breast 6 | Add-ons: Add a grilled Chicken Breast $6

name: Soup, Salad & Homemade Nut Muffin
description: Your choice of our French Onion, Chipotle Beef Chili or Chef’s Soup of the Day served with a fresh garden salad, your choice of Dressing and a pumpkin walnut muffin.

name: Pecan Salmon Salad
description: A petite cut of Salmon oven baked with crushed pecan seasoned breadcrumbs, served over fresh field greens with grape tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, hard boiled egg, honey ginger dressing and pumpkin nut muffin.

name: Olde Bryan’s Caesar Salad
description: Fresh, crisp romaine tossed with garlic croutons in a creamy Caesar dressing, garnished with hard boiled eggs, sprinkled with Parmesan & served with garlic toast. Add a grilled Chicken Breast or Cajun seasoned Chicken Breast 6 Add a grilled jumbo Shrimp Trio 8

name: Maple Chicken Salad (*GF
description: without muffin ) Grilled over an open flame, a fresh Chicken breast served on a bed of baby field greens with sliced local apples, sun-dried cranberries, blue cheese crumbles, grape tomatoes and pepitas. Served with a baked pumpkin nut muffin and maple balsamic vinaigrette. Substitute a petite Kentucky Boubon marinated Salmon fillet for the Chicken 4

name: Country Fried Chicken
description: Dipped in buttermilk & coated with seasoned flour, our fresh boneless chicken breasts are deep-fried, served with a side of gravy, fresh vegetables, & smashed potatoes.

name: Cran-Apple Turkey Panini
description: Thinly sliced, roasted turkey breast layered with locally-grown apple slices, fire-roasted peppers, fresh spinach, cheddar cheese & a cranberry mayonnaise; panini pressed on sunflower wheat bread, served with a side of our deli salad of the day.

name: O.B.I. Burger (*GF
description: without roll and fries ) Our butcher’s blend, half pound ground beef burger is seasoned & grilled to your liking over an open flame. Create your own burger with any of the toppings listed below: (add each) Sautéed Mushrooms or Onions, Cheddar, American, Bleu Cheese, Provolone, Colby Jack (add 1.50) for Bacon Served on a toasted hard roll with lettuce, tomato & fries. 18 | Add-ons: (add each) $1.00

name: O.B.I. Fish & Chips
description: Soaked in buttermilk & coated with Chef’s seasoned flour, our haddock fillet is deep-fried golden brown, served with a side of fries, coleslaw & an old-fashioned lemon dill tartar sauce.

name: Spicy Fried Chicken Sandwich
description: Soaked in buttermilk, our fresh, all-natural chicken breast coated with seasoned flour, deep-fried golden brown, topped with Pepper Jack cheese & served on a brioché roll with a garlic pepper aioli, lettuce, tomato & fries.

name: Open Faced Hot Turkey Sandwich
description: Sourdough bread topped with sliced oven roasted turkey breast & cranberry cornbread stuffing, served with homemade smashed potatoes, gravy, vegetable du jour & cranberry sauce.

name: French Onion Prime Rib Sandwich ~
description: AVAILABLE WHILE THEY LAST ~ Our petite cut of prime rib is charcoal grilled & topped with melted provolone & Swiss cheeses, caramelized onions & roasted garlic aioli. Served between garlic bread, with a side of our onion soup au jus for dipping & French fries.

name: Maple BBQ Balsamic Glazed Pork Chop (*GF*)
description: A ten-ounce, bone-in Pork Chop flame grilled to your liking, brushed with a delicious Maple barbecue balsamic sauce and served with seasoned vegetable & baked potato.

name: Roasted Vegetable Chimichanga
description: Flavored flour tortilla filled with fire roasted bell peppers, sautéed mushrooms, diced tomatoes, spinach, cheddar cheese and a garlic pepper aioli; deep-fried golden brown, oven baked with shredded Colby Jack cheese and served with pico de gallo, wild rice and sour cream.

name: Veggie Reuben
description: Sautéed mushrooms, spinach & onions layered on griddled rye bread with Swiss cheese, coleslaw & our own Russian dressing; served with our deli salad of the day.

name: Gochujang Vegetable Stir-fry
description: A blend of fresh mushrooms, bell peppers, broccoli florets, onions & spinach sautéed in toasted sesame oil with fresh garlic. Finished in a spicy Korean chili sauce, garnished with crispy wontons and served on a bed of wild rice. *Add sautéed Chicken Breast strips 6 **Add a jumbo Shrimp Trio 8 | Add-ons: Add sautéed Chicken Breast strips $6 / Add a jumbo Shrimp Trio $8

name: Chicken Cordon Bleu
description: Our version includes twin boneless chicken breasts coated with seasoned flour, pan-seared in garlic butter & white wine with prosciutto, topped with Swiss cheese & presented with a roasted garlic-black pepper cream sauce, smashed potatoes & Chef’s choice vegetable.

name: Oven Roasted Turkey Dinner
description: Oven roasted Turkey breast served the old-fashioned way with homemade mashed potatoes, gravy, cranberry cornbread stuffing, Chef’s choice of vegetable & cranberry sauce.

name: Andouille Sausage, Chicken & Shrimp Jambalaya (*GF)
description: Baby shrimp, chicken breast strips & Oscar’s Smokehouse andouille sausage sautéed in garlic butter with bell peppers, diced tomatoes, onions & Cajun seasoning; finished in a spicy scampi sauce, served on a bed of wild rice with our horseradish cream.

name: Gorgonzola Encrusted NY Strip Steak
description: Our choice, 10 oz, New York Strip Steak flame grilled to your liking, encrusted with a gorgonzola cheese & panko horseradish blend. Finished with a hot Creole mustard sauce and served with your choice of potato Chef’s vegetable side. ***Also available as a seasoned Strip steak with classic Demi-Glace ***

name: Chicken & Prosciutto Saltimbocca
description: Twin, boneless Chicken Breasts coasted in seasoned flour, pan-seared in garlic butter with basil, oregano, rendered prosciutto and fresh spinach. Finished in a lemon-sage white wine sauce & served over cavatappi pasta with grilled garlic toast.

name: Baked Haddock & Rock Shrimp Scampi (*GF)
description: Oven baked in garlic butter and white wine with baby rock Shrimp, our Haddock fillet is finished in a lemon herb scampi sauce with wild rice and chef’s seasoned vegetable of the day.

name: Kentucky Bourbon Salmon
description: Fresh Salmon fillets oven baked with Longfellows’ classic marinade featuring bourbon, brown sugar, soy sauce, cracked black pepper & citrus. Served with wild rice and seasoned vegetable. 32 Boneless Short Ribs Smoked Gouda Mac & Cheese Our award winning, boneless Short Ribs seared & braised with red wine, Worcestershire and brown sugar; sautéed in garlic butter with spinach & mushrooms and finished in a smoked gouda cream sauce. Tossed with cavatappi pasta and topped with chopped green onions and grilled garlic toast.

name: Garlic-Herb Butter Filet Mignon
description: Seasoned hand cut Filet Mignon grilled to your liking, brushed with a roasted garlic-herb-compound butter, and served over garlic toast with a baked potato and fresh seasoned vegetables.

name: Cedar Citrus Garlic Salmon (*GF)
description: Oven baked with a cedar smoked citrus garlic rub, our twin Salmon fillets are oven baked with butter and white wine. Served with wild rice and seasoned vegetable.

name: Prime Rib Dinner **
description: Available after 4 pm ** Our choice, well marbled, twelve ounce Prime Rib is slow roasted and served with medium rare with your choice of potato and Chef’s vegetable side.

name: Chocolate Mousse (*GF) ~
description: tempered Chocolate folded with whipped cream and egg whites …

name: Crème Brulee (*GF) ~
description: house made custard with torched sugar topping…

name: Homemade Warm Apple Crisp
description: ~ locally grown from Saratoga Apple Farm… 10 Saratoga Gelato Sorbet (*GF) … 5 Morgan’s Chocolate Chip Walnut Pie ~ featuring Hershey’s chocolate chips & chopped walnuts in a flaky pie crust… 10 Toll House Cookie Pie Sundae ~ with chocolate chips & walnuts in a flaky pie crust, layers of vanilla ice cream, Sundaes Best Hot Fudge and whipped cream. Each Sundae comes with at least two spoons!!

name: Hot Turkey
description: Served with smashed potatoes, stuffing, gravy & cranberry sauce

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Served with French fries

name: Homemade Mac & Cheese
description: Pasta in a triple cheese cream sauce, broiler finished en casserole & served with Garlic Bread

name: Pasta with Butter or Marinara Sauce
description: Choice of Butter or Marinara Red sauce Served with Garlic Bread & Parmesan Cheese

name: Fried Chicken, Chicken Fingers, or Grilled Chicken
description: Served with French fries

name: Fried Mozzarella Cheese Sticks
description: Served with Raspberry dipping sauce & French fries

name: Hamburger
description: Cooked Medium Well unless specified! Served with French fries.

name: Empress 75
description: Enter the New Year right with our bubbly and refreshing cocktail made with Empress Gin, lemon juice, and prosecco

name: Thai Chili Chicken Bites
description: Fresh Chicken breast strips coated in seasoned flour, deep-fried golden brown, then tossed in our sweet Thai chili sauce, garnished with toasted sesame seeds.

name: OBI Grille
description: This old favorite consists of in house oven Roasted Turkey layered with Baked Virginia Ham on griddled sourdough bread with fresh sliced tomatoes, hickory bacon and Swiss cheese with a horseradish dijonaisse; served with a side of fries.

name: Braised Beef-Short Rib Ravioli Sauté
description: Fresh bell peppers, mushrooms and onions sauteed in garlic butter with shaved Beef Tenderloin; finished in our homemade Marinara sauce over Angus Beef Short Rib-caramelized onion-carrot-mozzarella filled ravioli; garnished with parmesan and served with garlic toast.

name: Baked Salmon Provencal
description: Oven baked with fresh diced tomatoes with a pinch of garlic, oregano and basil, our fresh Salmon fillets are sprinkled with feta cheese, drizzled with a balsamic reduction and served with wild rice with fresh seasoned vegetables.

name: Grilled Winter Pork Chop
description: Our fresh, bone-in, ten-ounce bone-in Pork Chop is marinated in a blend of olive oil and Worcestershire sauce with fresh chopped garlic and a dash of Dijon; grilled over an open flame and served with red bliss smashed potatoes and fresh seasoned vegetables.

name: Chicken Butternut Squash-Pumpkin Ravioli Sauté
description: Fresh Chicken breast strips sautéed in garlic butter with sliced mushrooms, broccoli, artichoke hearts and sun-dried tomatoes; finished in a sherry herb cream sauce and served over butternut squash-pumpkin-mascarpone filled ravioli. Topped with Parmesan and garlic toast.
